title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Terrorbyte Client Jobs
content:
Benefactorâ€™s known for state-of-the-art tech, and the Terrorbyte provides access to hacker extraordinaire, Paige Harris. Use the Nerve Center touchscreen inside the vehicle to launch Terrorbyte Client Jobs and help prospective clients disrupt various crimes across the city to collect 3X GTA$ and RP.

Completing three Terrorbyte Client Jobs will also fulfill the Weekly Challenge and land you a bonus lump sum of GTA$100,000.
